page.title: 03OIL DEVELOPMENTS-HARBOUR
page.content: One of the other changes to the harbour has been the addition of a number of oil-related service industries to the locality.These include tool distributors, pipe suppliers,geological survey companies and specialised engineering facilities One of the casualities of these structural changes has been the disappearance of the original fishing village of Old Torry.The site where the rows of little cottages once stood is now Shell U.K. Exploration Oil Base comprising of cylindrical oil tanks, warehouses,offices and storage yards festooned with pipes and drilling equipment.despite being designated a Conservation Area and also strong local opposition,redevelopment went ahead due to the urgent need for meeting and accomodating the oil industry's demands at the time.
